profile.name: Matvei Anoshin
profile.bio: I'm Matvei Anoshin â€” a BSc from Moscow Institute of Physics and Technology (MIPT) with 3+ years of experience in Machine Learning and Quantum Computing. I have extensive background in ML & DL, curated with projects work during Summer Schools (EEML-2025, AIRI-2025, SMILES-2024) along with strong physics knowledge (Gold Medalist of All-Russian Student Physicists' Tournament 2025 and a Semifinalist of International Physicists' Tournament 2024), which I dedicate to scientific research useful for industrial applications of emerging technologies
